name: Kwame Nkrumah
description: Kwame Nkrumah, a 48-year-old expert in technology, navigates his daily life with cautious decision-making and an adaptive communication style. Residing in an office environment, he is currently focused on arranging home modifications for the elderly, motivated by his own limited mobility experiences, which have made him acutely aware of the importance of accessibility and safety. His reserved demeanor paired with a very expressive personality allows him to connect with diverse individuals while still carefully considering every detail.
